item.title: OpenAI 与富士康合作为数据中心设计硬件
item.description: OpenAI 正在与鸿海精密工业股份有限公司合作设计和制造数据中心硬件，这是该乐虎国际_乐虎国际app_乐虎国际APP下载_乐虎国际手机客户端为满足其对支持人工智能系统的基础设施日益增长的需求而采取的最新举措。【原文：OpenAI is partnering with Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. to design and manufacture hardware for data centers, the latest move by the ChatGPT maker to meet its surging need for infrastructure to support artificial intelligence systems.】

item.title: 华尔街涨势消退后股市将走弱：市场综述
item.description: 华尔街出现动荡，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）引领的短暂救市反弹迅速消退，投资者从加密货币等风险较高的资产上撤出，股市在此之后又将迎来一个疲软的交易日。【原文：Equities were poised for another weak session after turbulence on Wall Street, where a brief Nvidia Corp.-led relief rally quickly faded and investors retreated from riskier assets such as cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 英国计划投资 100 亿英镑建设威尔士数据中心枢纽，推动人工智能发展
item.description: 英国计划在威尔士南部建立一个数据中心园区，开发商 Vantage Data Centers 将斥资 100 亿英镑（131 亿美元）在微软公司所在地附近建造设施。【原文：The UK plans to open a data center campus in south Wales, with developer Vantage Data Centers spending £10 billion ($13.1 billion) for facilities near a Microsoft Corp. site.】

item.title: 高盛洪水认为 "极端 "关注套期保值是股市下跌的驱动力
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）合伙人约翰-弗拉德（John Flood）表示，周四美股的大幅反转凸显了英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：A dramatic reversal in US stocks Thursday underscored how Nvidia Corp.’s blowout earnings failed to deliver the “all clear” for risk that traders sought, instead sending them for cover against further losses, Goldman Sachs’ partner John Flood said.】

item.title: 德意志银行警告日本资本外逃与英国危机如出一辙
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）全球货币研究主管表示，真荣孝一的支出计划已导致日本债券和货币暴跌，引发了不规则资本外逃的幽灵，让人联想起 2022 年几乎摧毁英国债券市场的动荡。【原文：Sanae Takaichi’s spending plans have sent Japan’s bonds and currency tumbling, raising the specter of an unruly capital flight reminiscent of the turmoil that nearly broke the UK bond market in 2022, according to Deutsche Bank AG’s global head of currency research.】

item.title: 日本决策者对日元措辞的交易指南
item.description: 日元对美元汇率 10 个月来首次突破 157 点，这可能会助长人们的猜测，即日本可能不得不考虑自 2024 年 7 月以来首次采取行动支撑本国货币。【原文：The yen’s breaching of the 157 level against the dollar for the first time in 10 months is likely to fuel speculation that Japan may have to consider taking action to prop up its currency for the first time since July 2024.】

item.title: 跳跃交易悄然加入事件投注热潮，成为做市商
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Jump Trading 已悄然成为最早活跃在 Kalshi Inc.等预测市场的自营交易公司之一，并向最热门的新兴衍生品市场拓展。【原文：Jump Trading has quietly become one of the earliest proprietary trading firms to become active on prediction markets like Kalshi Inc., expanding into one of the hottest new derivatives markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Asurion 接近达成 CVC 支持的国内印花厂交易；通用汽车
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Asurion LLC 正在就收购 Domestic & General Group Ltd. 进行深入谈判，该交易对英国保修业务的估值为 21 亿英镑（27.4 亿美元）。【原文：Asurion LLC is in advanced talks to acquire Domestic & General Group Ltd. in a deal valuing the UK warranty business at £2.1 billion ($2.74 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Meta 董事会以 1.9 亿美元解决投资者的隐私索赔问题
item.description: 法院文件显示，亿万富翁马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）和 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Billionaire Mark Zuckerberg and other Meta Platforms Inc. directors agreed to a $190 million settlement of claims they failed to rectify repeated violations of Facebook users’ privacy and improperly engineered an accord to protect Zuckerberg from personal liability for the privacy missteps, court filings show.】

item.title: 美国新任大使抨击智利总统批评特朗普
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）最近对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的批评 "令人失望"，表明双边关系 "已经跌到了何种地步"，这位新到任的美国大使在其首次新闻发布会上如是说。【原文：Chilean President Gabriel Boric’s recent criticism of Donald Trump was “disappointing” and shows how far bilateral relations “have fallen,” the newly arrived US ambassador said at his first press conference.】

item.title: 美国指控四人向中国走私先进 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: 联邦检察官指控两名中国公民和两名美国公民违反国家安全出口限制，策划将数百枚 Nvidia 公司生产的精密芯片运往中国。【原文：Federal prosecutors charged two Chinese nationals and two US citizens with a scheme to ship hundreds of sophisticated chips made by Nvidia Corp. to China in violation of national security export restrictions.】

item.title: 英国央行利率制定者警告：英国脱欧的影响大于预期
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者斯瓦蒂-丁格拉（Swati Dhingra）表示，研究表明，英国脱离欧盟对英国经济造成的打击可能比人们担心的 "更严重"。【原文：Research suggests the blow dealt to the UK economy by Britain leaving the European Union may be at the “higher end” of what was feared, according to Bank of England rate-setter Swati Dhingra.】

item.title: 人类投资加剧了对人工智能循环交易的担忧
item.description: Anthropic 正在借鉴 OpenAI 的投资策略。另外：谷歌发布双子座 3，大获全胜。但首先...【原文：Anthropic is taking a page from OpenAI’s investment playbook. Plus: Google scores a big win with the release of Gemini 3. But first…】

item.title: 政府小组成员称，日元干预可能会在 160 日元之前出现
item.description: 一位政府小组成员表示，随着日元汇率继续向 1 美元兑 160 日元迈进，日本可能比许多投资者想象的更接近于干预货币市场。【原文：Japan may be closer to intervening in the currency market than many investors assume, a government panel member suggested, as the yen continues to drift toward 160 per dollar.】

item.title: BlueBay 筹备在未开发市场发行首只日本债券基金
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）计划在明年初推出首只日元债券基金，押注日本市场的深化和收益率的上升将刺激投资者的需求。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management plans to launch its first yen-denominated bond fund early next year, betting that the deepening of Japan’s markets and rising yields will fuel investor demand.】

item.title: 加拿大敦促英格鲁集团和泰克集团提供总部工作保障
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大正在向英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）施压，要求英美资源集团作出更有力的承诺，在拟建的温哥华总部提供行政和管理职位，作为收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）的条件。【原文：Canada is putting pressure on Anglo American Plc to make stronger commitments to executive and management jobs at its proposed Vancouver headquarters as a condition of taking over Teck Resources Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥集团、主要农作物贸易商关注阿根廷 Milei 铁路私有化问题
item.description: 投资者希望利用哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的下一轮市场改革，正准备参加阿根廷陷入困境的货运铁路私有化招标，这也是总统为释放大量农业和矿业出口所做努力的一部分。【原文：Investors seeking to capitalize on Javier Milei’s next round of market reforms are gearing up to bid in a tender to privatize Argentina’s beleaguered freight railways, part of the president’s effort to unleash vast agriculture and mining exports.】

item.title: 美国扩大 NGL 出口，出现分馏能力风险
item.description: 随着全球买家对美国桶装天然气液表现出兴趣，美国中游公司正竞相扩大天然气液出口能力，但分析师警告说，加工挤压可能会在货物到达码头之前很长时间拖慢系统速度。【原文：US midstream companies are racing to expand natural gas liquids export capacity as global buyers show interest in American barrels, but analysts warn that a processing squeeze could slow the system long before cargoes reach the docks.】

item.title: 竞争对手被收购，上市前市场初创企业在自己的平台上融资
item.description: Hiive Markets Ltd.是一家上市前公司股票在线交易平台，在华尔街公司抢购其两家竞争对手几天后，该公司正在通过在自己的市场上市筹集资金。【原文：Hiive Markets Ltd., an online platform for trading shares of pre-public companies, is raising funds by listing itself on its own marketplace, days after Wall Street firms snapped up two of its rivals.】

item.title: 谷歌最新款 Pixel 手机现在可以与 iPhone 进行 AirDrop 连接
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司（Google）表示，它已经开发出一种方法，让其最新的Pixel智能手机可以使用苹果公司的AirDrop协议与iPhone交换图像和其他文件，这是谷歌破坏其竞争对手严密保护的生态系统的排他性的一次大胆尝试。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google said it has developed a way for its latest Pixel smartphones to exchange images and other files with iPhones using Apple Inc.’s AirDrop protocol, a bold attempt to undermine the exclusivity of its rival’s closely guarded ecosystem.】

item.title: BCE 紧随 Verizon 在电信和媒体部门进行更多裁员
item.description: 加拿大收入最大的电信公司 BCE 公司正在解雇约 690 名非工会员工，以实施恢复盈利和现金流增长的战略。【原文：BCE Inc., Canada’s largest telecommunications firm by revenue, is letting go about 690 non-unionized employees as it implements a strategy to restore growth in earnings and cash flow.】

item.title: 特朗普计划将扩大西海岸和北极的海上钻井规模
item.description: 作为周四公布的蓝图草案的一部分，特朗普政府提议向西海岸和北极地区开放新的原油钻探区域，这将大幅扩大海上石油和天然气开采权的销售。【原文：The Trump administration is proposing to open new areas off the West Coast and in the Arctic to crude drilling as part of a draft blueprint released Thursday that would dramatically expand the sale of offshore oil and natural gas rights.】

item.title: KKR 募集 150 亿美元资金，彰显亚洲实力
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.公司在为其在亚洲的最新投资工具筹集 150 亿美元资金时，正在鼓吹近期亚洲基金的实力。【原文：KKR & Co. is touting the strength of recent Asia funds as it looks to gather $15 billion for its latest vehicle in the region, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 交易员寻找四月以来最大 S&P 逆转背后的线索
item.description: 处于人工智能竞赛中心的芯片制造商的爆炸性财报。就业报告证实经济依然强劲。全球最大零售商的季度更新显示消费者仍在消费。【原文：Blowout earnings results from the chipmaker at the epicenter of the AI race. A jobs report confirming the economy remains on strong footing. A quarterly update from the world’s largest retailer showing consumers are still spending.】

item.title: Ares 公司和 Regions 公司牵头为食品供应商提供 8 亿美元直接贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，作为 Palladium Equity Partners 支持的 Quirch Foods 公司 11 亿美元再融资的一部分，Ares Management Corp. 和 Regions Bank 主导了 8 亿美元的私人信用贷款。【原文：Ares Management Corp. and Regions Bank led $800 million of private credit loans as part of a $1.1 billion refinancing for Palladium Equity Partners-backed Quirch Foods, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 永明人寿大力招聘，加强资产部实力
item.description: 永明金融公司（Sun Life Financial Inc. ）新近统一的资产管理部门计划招聘约 20 名高级管理人员，以将投资经理的集合转变为一个更加协调的全球力量。【原文：Sun Life Financial Inc.’s newly unified asset-management division plans to hire about 20 senior executives as it looks to turn a collection of investment managers into a more coordinated global powerhouse.】

item.title: 美联储古尔斯比表示对 "前置式 "降息感到不安
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他对在 12 月份的央行会议上再次降息仍心存疑虑。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee signaled that he’s still apprehensive about delivering another rate cut at the central bank’s December meeting.】

item.title: 德意志银行就 Finra 冲突索赔案达成 250 万美元和解
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将支付 250 万美元，以解决行业监管机构指控其未能在债务和股票研究报告中适当披露利益冲突的问题。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG will pay $2.5 million to resolve an industry regulator’s allegations that it failed to properly disclose conflicts of interest in debt and equity research reports.】

item.title: Perplexity 在移动平台上推出人工智能浏览器，扩展与谷歌的竞争关系
item.description: Perplexity AI公司推出了移动设备版Comet网络浏览器，将与谷歌的竞争延伸到了谷歌的安卓操作系统上。【原文：Perplexity AI unveiled a version of its Comet web browser for mobile devices, extending a rivalry with Google to the search giant’s Android operating system.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利推迟数据中心债务出售，阿里巴巴面临风险
item.description: 以摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）为首的银行推迟了一个关键的最后期限，以便给投资者更多的时间来评估 ServerFarm 公司 5.89 亿美元的数据中心债券，因为这些债券与中国科技巨头阿里巴巴集团（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. ）的关系引起了投资者的担忧。【原文：Banks led by Morgan Stanley pushed back a key deadline to give investors more time to evaluate $589 million of ServerFarm data center bonds after concerns flared up over their ties to Chinese technology giant Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.】
